name: discord-movienight
excerpt: Discord bot for tracking movies for movienights, uses ChatGPT for fun Adam Sandler style comments.
description:
This is a Discord bot programmed in Java, utilizing the Javacord library and Maven for project management.

The bot's main functionality is to maintain a 'to-watch' list of movies that a Discord server community is interested in watching.

It fetches movie data from the OMDB API and saves this information in .json files, storing data both per server and in a cache file for quick access to recently requested movie information.

Incorporating ChatGPT through sashirestela's simple-openai library, the bot is capable of engaging in conversation, copying the personality of Adam Sandler. Additionally, this integration allows the bot to generate custom remarks regarding planned movie events and more.
